title: Drippler Crippler
summaries: The Drippler Crippler is a Hardmode flail that drops from Blood Eels. When used, it will spin around the player and can be thrown outwards to deal very high damage before being pulled back in, as well as firing a projectile doing half of the base damage.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 4
